overview: The stories are based on the concepts of Paranormal, psychic situations Blind faith on black magic and witch craft , Severe superstitions and rituals Reincarnation, fake identity and mysterious comeback. The film rationalizes the good and the bad sides of popular belief and age-old ideas, the evil of superstition and the dark side of mankind.
title: Purbo Poschim Dokkhin Uttor Ashbei
